attributes.action: Make carrying of a knife a mandatory 10 year Prison Sentence.
attributes.additional_details: Agree to make it a mandatory 10 year prison sentence.
attributes.background: Anyone caught carrying a knife or dangerous weapon, get an automatic 10 year Prison Sentence.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Increase minimum sentence for carrying a knife to 10 years
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/750758
